description:
These long and narrow float bags are sized to slide easily into the bow on either side of your kayak’s centre support pillar.

  • Made of 10-gauge urethane fabric that won't leak or delaminate
  • Fits forward of the foot area in most kayaks longer than 2.44m (8ft.)
  • To ensure floodable spaces are completely filled, measure your boat’s compartments and use a bag that is slightly larger
  • Inflated dimensions are 58 x 25.4 (top) x 7.6cm (bottom) or 23 x 10 x 3in
  • Sold singly
name: NRS Kayak Split Bow Flotation Bag
